snippet.title: Road 96 - Story Trailer | Day of the Devs 2021
snippet.description:
Get another look at this procedural narrative game, Road 96, coming to PC and Switch in 2021. In Road 96, the country of Petria has gone to hell. Hitchhike your way across country, meet memorable characters, discover secrets, and learn skills to help you cross the border to freedom.

#SummerGamesFest
